301.customerMessage2: I need to reset my hot topic account
301.AgentMessage1: Hot Topic: Thanks for patiently waiting, and I apologize for any inconvenience. I'm happy to help! Can you clarify what you mean by "reset"? Are you trying to change your password, update your account information, or something else?
301.customerMessage4: I was trying to acces my hot topic account because I had the hot bucks thing from a different purchase
301.customerMessage5: I'll go fix it in person if I can
301.AgentMessage2: Hot Topic: Sorry about that! Can you try changing your password by clicking on "Forgot password"? This will allow you to reset the password so you can access your account. Let me know how it goes!
